# anispace

*An R package providing spatial transformation methods for movement
data*

The primary aim of the *anispace* package is to provide spatial
transformation methods for movement data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of *anispace* with:

``` r
install.packages('anispace', repos = c('https://animovement.r-universe.dev', 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))
```

Once you have installed the package, you can load it with:

``` r
library("anispace")
```

# Package index

## Transformations

These functions allow you to make tranformations to your coordinate
system, such as translations, rotations or conversion to polar
coordinates.

- [`transform_to_egocentric()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/transform_to_egocentric.md)
  : Transform coordinates to egocentric reference frame
- [`translate_coords()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/translate_coords.md)
  : Translate coordinates (Cartesian)
- [`rotate_coords()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/rotate_coords.md)
  : Rotate coordinates in Cartesian space (2D or 3D)
- [`map_to_cartesian()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/map_to_cartesian.md)
  : Map from polar to Cartesian coordinates
- [`map_to_polar()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/map_to_polar.md)
  : Map from Cartesian to polar coordinates
- [`map_to_cylindrical()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/map_to_cylindrical.md)
  : Map from Cartesian to cylindrical coordinates
- [`map_to_spherical()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/map_to_spherical.md)
  : Map from Cartesian to spherical coordinates
- [`cartesian_to_rho()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/cartesian_to_rho.md)
  : Cartesian radius (œÅ) from coordinates
- [`cartesian_to_phi()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/cartesian_to_phi.md)
  : Cartesian azimuth (œÜ) from coordinates
- [`cartesian_to_theta()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/cartesian_to_theta.md)
  : Polar angle (Œ∏) from Cartesian coordinates
- [`polar_to_x()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/polar_to_x.md)
  : Convert polar radius to Cartesian x‚Äëcoordinate
- [`polar_to_y()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/polar_to_y.md)
  : Convert polar radius to Cartesian y‚Äëcoordinate
- [`spherical_to_z()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/spherical_to_z.md)
  : Convert cylindrical radius and polar angle to Cartesian z‚Äëcoordinate

## Helpers

- [`calculate_angular_difference()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/calculate_angular_difference.md)
  : Calculate angular difference
- [`wrap_angle()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/wrap_angle.md)
  : Constrain angles to a standard range
- [`unwrap_angle()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/unwrap_angle.md)
  : Remove constrain for angles to keep within \[0, 2œÄ)
- [`diff_angle()`](http://animovement.dev/anispace/reference/diff_angle.md)
  : Difference of angular values
